document_data.name: Justlance
document_data.mainbody: '''''Justlance''''' was an [[adamantine]] [[returning]] [[spear]], and the [[cleric]] [[Marrec]]'s favored weapon in {{yearlink|1373}}.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|29|4}}
document_data.Description: ''Justlance'' was an adamantine spear, with the tip fashioned in the form of a unicorn's horn.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|13|2}}
document_data.Powers: ''Justlance'' always returned to the wielder's hand after being thrown, unable to be parted from its wielder for long. Blessed by a deity, rot did not adhere to the spear.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1373}}, [[Marrec]] had been the wielder of ''Justlance'' for some time. Those who survived combat with him learned to fear its enchantment.
